Unresolved & Undetected Galaxies in HI4PI
Last 4 added from GALFA-HI resolved category, 5 above that (UrsaMinor-Fornax) moved from HI4PI resolved to here, because radius close to 8 arcmin
These are all the galaxies that have velocity values in the hi4pi_unresolved_undetected table, this is the range of the standard deviations found at each velocity channel at the location of the galaxy in +/- 5 channels from the central velocity channel. They are all set to equal a 30arcmin diameter area.
Code: Unresolved Undetected
